title: WOMBLE VIDEO–MR MOOTS AND THE DREAM HARDTAIL
content:
Mr. Moots finds himself out roosting around on the the WOMBLE while be chased down by two would-be riders. Was it a dream? Was it real? What happened out there? Tune in and find out!

Mr. Moots and the WOMBLE…..the dream team.

Elusive Mr. Moots out living the dream on the WOMBLE.

The post WOMBLE VIDEO–MR MOOTS AND THE DREAM HARDTAIL appeared first on Moots.
author: Jon Cariveau
